statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE receiver_address LIKE '%xyz%';
SELECT encrypted_data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE sender_address LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE receiver_address = 'John Doe' OR receiver_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY sender_address ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sender_address DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE encrypted_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT name, public_key FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, timestamp FROM stakeholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, name, public_key FROM stakeholders WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT amount, recipient_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT id, name, public_key FROM stakeholders WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE recipient_id = 5 AND amount < 500 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Blockchains;
SELECT id, name FROM Blockchains ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, encryption_key FROM Blockchains WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT username, public_key FROM Users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE receiver = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sender FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM Transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT username, public_key FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name FROM Blockchains WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Blockchain_Users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_name, expiration_date FROM Blockchain_Contracts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM Blockchain_Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT key_id, user_id, encryption_key FROM Blockchain_Keys WHERE user_id = '987e6543-abcd-21f3-b765-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Blockchain_Users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT contract_name, expiration_date FROM Blockchain_Contracts WHERE expiration_date > now() ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, encryption_key FROM Blockchain_Keys WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, timestamp FROM Blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT u.username, e.encryption_key FROM Users u JOIN EncryptionKeys e ON u.user_id = e.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM Blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_address, balance FROM Wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
